The Iconic Gold Awards is an annual awards show that honours the best performers in the Hindi films and Television industry.
The Iconic Gold Awards was founded in 2020 by Priya P. Jaiswal, and Piyush Jaiiswaal serves as the CEO. The event recognises achievements in acting, production, direction, and technical categories and best known for its red-carpet presence and celebrity participation the awards are streamed on ZEE5, reaching audiences across India and abroad.
